  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2269</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electrical fields about a moving chage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrisch fängt über ein bewegliches 
chage auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Champs électriques au sujet d'un chage mobile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Campos elétricos sobre um chage movente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Campi elettrici circa un chage commovente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικά πεδία για ένα κινούμενο chage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Campos eléctricos sobre un chage móvil</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the electric fields which form about an oscillating electrical charge.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical phenomena</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic fields</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die das elektrische zeigt, 
fängt auf, die über eine oszillierende elektrische Ladung 
sich bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre les champs 
électriques qui forment au sujet d'une charge électrique 
d'oscillation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre os campos elétricos 
que dão forma sobre uma carga elétrica oscilando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra i campi elettrici che 
formano circa una carica elettrica oscillante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τα ηλεκτρικά πεδία που
διαμορφώνουν για μια ταλαντεμένος ηλεκτρική δαπάνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra los campos 
eléctricos que forman sobre una carga eléctrica oscilante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Phänomene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetisch fängt auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
